data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Pará, Brazil, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pará, Brazil

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,892,411 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Pará, Brazil.
data.prayer: Spirit, make yourself real to these new families.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Pará. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Pará prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Turiwara people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Turiwara people.
Father, please give the church in the state of Pará prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Pará, Brazil.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Pará, Brazil.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

location.name: Pará
location.people_groups_list: Borari, Gaviao do Maranhao, Metyktire, Amanaye, Galibi do Oiapoque
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Borari (800), Gaviao do Maranhao (800), Metyktire (100), Amanaye (100), Galibi do Oiapoque (70)
